SELECT STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_TEL, STO_OPEN, STO_CLOSE, STO_ADDR, STO_INTRO, ORD_LIMIT, DELI_TIME, ENTER_YN, OPEN_YN, CEO_NAME, DELIVERY, STO_EMAIL, APRV_STATUS, SI.BRAND_CODE, USER_ID, B.BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN BRAND B ON SI.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE WHERE OPEN_YN='Y'
AND BRAND_NAME LIKE '%' || #{search_input} || '%'
AND STO_NAME LIKE '%' || #{search_input} || '%'

SELECT STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME FROM( SELECT S.STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME, SUM(ORD_PRICE) FROM STORE_INFO S JOIN ORDER_PRO O ON S.STO_NUM = O.STO_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON S.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE GROUP BY S.STO_NUM, BRAND_PIC, STO_NAME, BRAND_NAME ORDER BY SUM(ORD_PRICE) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT STO_NUM, STO_NAME, BRAND_PIC, BRAND_NAME FROM BRAND B JOIN STORE_INFO SI ON B.BRAND_CODE = SI.BRAND_CODE WHERE B.BRAND_CODE = #{brand_code}
